issue.title: Build SplitSync Expense App
issue.body:
Build SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, Tailwind CSS, and Playwright.

Features:
1. User authentication with secure password hashing
2. Group creation and management
3. Expense tracking with multiple split methods
4. Balance calculations and settlements
5. Real-time updates via WebSocket
6. Responsive UI with shadcn/ui

ems.task: Set up project foundation with configuration files, CI/CD pipeline, and shared types. Create .gitignore, package.json with all dependencies, tsconfig.json, next.config.js, tailwind.config.ts, postcss.config.js, .env.example, ESLint/Prettier configs, .github/workflows/ci.yml with lint/typecheck/test/build jobs, Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, and README.md with setup instructions. DO NOT create any src/ directory - only root-level configuration files.

analysisSummary: Build SplitSync expense sharing app with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Drizzle ORM, Socket.io, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Implementation includes user authentication, group management, expense tracking with multiple split methods, balance calculations, settlements, real-time WebSocket updates, and responsive UI with comprehensive testing via Playwright.

pendingEMs.task: Create data layer with Drizzle ORM schema, database connection, and migration system. Define database schema for users, groups, expenses, splits, and settlements. Set up Drizzle configuration, create database connection utility, implement repository pattern for data access, create initial migrations, and add seed data for development.

Implement authentication system with secure password hashing, session management, and middleware. Create authentication utilities with bcrypt, JWT token management, login/register API routes, auth middleware for protected routes, session management, and password reset functionality.

Build user and group management API routes and business logic. Create CRUD operations for users, group creation/management APIs, group member management, invite system, permission handling, and group-specific data retrieval endpoints.

Implement expense tracking APIs with multiple split methods (equal, exact, percentage). Create expense CRUD operations, split calculation logic, expense validation, category management, receipt/image upload handling, and expense history tracking.

Build balance calculation and settlement system. Implement balance tracking algorithms, debt calculation between users, settlement suggestion logic, payment recording APIs, balance history, and settlement status tracking.

Implement real-time updates with Socket.io. Set up Socket.io server, create WebSocket event handlers for live updates (expenses, balances, group changes), implement connection management, room-based messaging per group, and real-time notification system.

Create reusable UI components with shadcn/ui. Build authentication components (login form, register form), layout components (header, sidebar, navigation), expense form components, balance display components, group management UI components, and common interactive elements.

Build page components and routing structure. Create homepage, dashboard view, group detail pages, expense creation/listing pages, balance/settlement pages, user profile pages, and settings pages. Implement client-side data fetching and state management.

Implement comprehensive E2E testing with Playwright. Create test suite for authentication flows, group management, expense creation and tracking, balance calculations, settlement workflows, real-time updates, and responsive design testing. Set up test fixtures, utilities, and CI integration.
